name: transparency
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: transparency
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the characteristic of being easy to see through

example.eg: The old-fashioned type of plastic lacked transparency.

trans_examp.trans_en: a photograph or picture printed on plastic that you can see on a screen by shining a light through it

dsense.name: transparency
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the quality of being done in an open way without secrets
trans_examp.trans_cn: （公开处理，非秘密进行的）透明度

example.eg: We want more transparency in government.
